setting.name: atmoWinTarget
setting.description: Select if you want to use AtmoWin.

setting.name: boblightTarget
setting.description: Select if you want to use Boblight.

setting.name: hueTarget
setting.description: Select if you want to use Hue.

setting.name: hyperionTarget
setting.description: Select if you want to use Hyperion.

setting.name: RestartOnError
setting.displayname: Reconnection to target software on Error:
setting.description: Choose if you want MediaPortal/AtmoLight to reconnect if something goes wrong.

setting.name: atmowinexe
setting.description: Please select the path to the AtmoWinA.exe!

setting.name: StartAtmoWin
setting.description: Choose if you want MediaPortal/AtmoLight to start AtmoWin for you on.

setting.name: ExitAtmoWin
setting.description: Choose if you want MediaPortal/AtmoLight to close AtmoWin for you.

setting.name: boblightIP
setting.description: Please enter the IP to Boblight!

setting.name: boblightPort
setting.description: Please enter the Port to Boblight.

setting.name: boblightMaxReconnectAttempts
setting.description: Please enter the reconnect attempts.

setting.name: boblightReconnectDelay
setting.description: Please enter the reconnect delay.

setting.name: boblightMaxFPS
setting.description: Please enter the max FPS.

setting.name: boblightSpeed
setting.description: Please enter the value for speed.

setting.name: boblightAutospeed
setting.description: Please enter the value for autospeed.

setting.name: boblightInterpolation
setting.description: Choose if you want to use interpolation.

setting.name: boblightSaturation
setting.description: Please enter the value for saturation.

setting.name: boblightValue
setting.description: Please enter the value.

setting.name: boblightThreshold
setting.description: Please enter the value for threshold.

setting.name: boblightGamma
setting.description: Please enter the value for gamma.

setting.name: hueExe
setting.description: Please select the path to the AtmoHue.exe!

setting.name: hueStart
setting.description: Choose if you want to start AtmoHue with MediaPortal.

setting.name: hueIsRemoteMachine
setting.description: Choose if AtmoHue is located on another PC.

setting.name: hueIP
setting.description: Please enter the IP to AtmoHue!

setting.name: huePort
setting.description: Please enter the Port to AtmoHue.

setting.name: hueMinimalColorDifference
setting.description: Please enter minimal color difference.

setting.name: hyperionIP
setting.description: Please enter the IP to Hyperion!

setting.name: hyperionPort
setting.description: Please enter the Port to Hyperion.

setting.name: hyperionPriority
setting.description: Please enter the priority for effects.

setting.name: hyperionStaticColorPriority
setting.description: Please enter the priority for static colors.

setting.name: hyperionReconnectDelay
setting.description: Please enter the reconnect delay.

setting.name: hyperionReconnectAttempts
setting.description: Please enter the reconnect attempts.

setting.name: effectVideo
setting.description: Choose the effect you want to use for Video/TV/Recording playback!
setting.displaylistvalues: LEDs disabled|MediaPortal Live Mode|Static Color|GIF Reader|VU Meter|VU Meter Rainbow|External Live Mode|Colorchanger|Colorchanger LR

setting.name: effectMusic
setting.description: Choose the effect you want to use for Music playback!
setting.displaylistvalues: LEDs disabled|MediaPortal Live Mode|Static Color|GIF Reader|VU Meter|VU Meter Rainbow|External Live Mode|Colorchanger|Colorchanger LR

setting.name: effectRadio
setting.description: Choose the effect you want to use for Radio playback!
setting.displaylistvalues: LEDs disabled|MediaPortal Live Mode|Static Color|GIF Reader|VU Meter|VU Meter Rainbow|External Live Mode|Colorchanger|Colorchanger LR

setting.name: effectMenu
setting.description: Choose the effect you want to use for Radio playback!
setting.displaylistvalues: LEDs disabled|MediaPortal Live Mode|Static Color|GIF Reader|VU Meter|VU Meter Rainbow|External Live Mode|Colorchanger|Colorchanger LR

setting.name: effectMPExit
setting.description: Choose the effect you want to use when you close MediaPortal!
setting.displaylistvalues: LEDs disabled|Static Color|External Live Mode|Colorchanger|Colorchanger LR

setting.name: StaticColorRed
setting.description: Enter the red value of the static color.

setting.name: StaticColorGreen
setting.description: Enter the green value of the static color.

setting.name: StaticColorBlue
setting.description: Enter the blue value of the static color.

setting.name: GIFFile
setting.description: Please select the path to a GIF file!

setting.name: OffOnStart
setting.description: Do you want to use the manual mode? (Ambilight will not start automatically when playback begins)

setting.name: excludeTimeStart
setting.description: Enter the start of the disabled timeframe.

setting.name: excludeTimeEnd
setting.description: Enter the end of the disabled timeframe.

setting.name: menubutton
setting.description: Choose the remote button for AtmoLight context menu.

setting.name: killbutton
setting.description: Choose the remote button to enable/disable Ambilight!

setting.name: cmbutton
setting.description: Choose the remote button change AtmoWin profile.

setting.name: lowCPU
setting.description: Select if you want to use the LOW CPU mode

setting.name: lowCPUTime
setting.description: Enter the low cpu delay.

setting.name: Delay
setting.description: Select if you want to use a delay

setting.name: DelayTime
setting.description: Enter the delay time.

setting.name: DelayRefreshRate
setting.description: Please enter the refreshrate at which you have measured the delay time.

setting.name: captureWidth
setting.description: Enter the capture width you want to use (Will only be used if AtmoWin is disabled!).

setting.name: captureHeight
setting.description: Enter the capture height you want to use (Will only be used if AtmoWin is disabled!).
